001package io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core;
002
003/**
004 * Represents a type of assertion used for validation.
005 *
006 * <p>Implementations of this interface define specific assertion types
007 * that determine how validation is performed across different domains,
008 * such as API responses, database queries, and UI components.
009 *
010 * <p>Each assertion type specifies:
011 * <ul>
012 *     <li>A unique identifier for the assertion type.</li>
013 *     <li>The expected data type that the assertion operates on.</li>
014 * </ul>
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
017 */
018public interface AssertionType<T extends Enum<T>> {
019
020   /**
021    * Retrieves the unique identifier of the assertion type.
022    *
023    * @return The enum representing the assertion type.
024    */
025   T type();
026
027   /**
028    * Retrieves the supported data type for this assertion.
029    *
030    * <p>Assertions are designed to validate specific data types.
031    * This method ensures compatibility by defining which data type
032    * the assertion operates on.
033    *
034    * @return The class representing the supported data type.
035    */
036   Class<?> getSupportedType();
037
038}
